Structure# Chart3DPose

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+

```
struct Chart3DPose
```

## [Topics](/documentation/charts/chart3dpose#topics)

### [Initializers](/documentation/charts/chart3dpose#Initializers)

[`init(azimuth: Angle2D, inclination: Angle2D)`](/documentation/charts/chart3dpose/init(azimuth:inclination:))Initialize a `Chart3DPose` with the provided azimuth and inclination angles.### [Instance Properties](/documentation/charts/chart3dpose#Instance-Properties)

[`var azimuth: Angle2D`](/documentation/charts/chart3dpose/azimuth)The azimuthal angle of the chart pose.[`var inclination: Angle2D`](/documentation/charts/chart3dpose/inclination)The inclination angle of the chart pose.### [Type Properties](/documentation/charts/chart3dpose#Type-Properties)

[`static var back: Chart3DPose`](/documentation/charts/chart3dpose/back)A pose to view a 3D Chart from the back.[`static var bottom: Chart3DPose`](/documentation/charts/chart3dpose/bottom)A pose to view a 3D Chart from the bottom.[`static var `default`: Chart3DPose`](/documentation/charts/chart3dpose/default)A pose to view a 3D Chart from a default position.[`static var front: Chart3DPose`](/documentation/charts/chart3dpose/front)A pose to view a 3D Chart from the front.[`static var left: Chart3DPose`](/documentation/charts/chart3dpose/left)A pose to view a 3D Chart from the left.[`static var right: Chart3DPose`](/documentation/charts/chart3dpose/right)A pose to view a 3D Chart from the right.[`static var top: Chart3DPose`](/documentation/charts/chart3dpose/top)A pose to view a 3D Chart from the top.## [Relationships](/documentation/charts/chart3dpose#relationships)
